statements: SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_type, content_path FROM user_content WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, content_type, creation_date FROM user_content ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, content_path FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 3 AND content_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM user_content WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND content_type = 'image';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(content_id) AS num_of_contents FROM user_content GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_of_contents > 5;
SELECT content_id, content_type, creation_date FROM user_content WHERE content_path LIKE '%/photos/%' AND creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT content_id, content_type, creation_date FROM user_content WHERE content_type IN ('video', 'audio') AND creation_date < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY creation_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE user_id = '1234abcd';
SELECT photo_url, description FROM photos WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = '5678efgh' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE photo_id = 'abcd1234';
SELECT photo_id, user_id FROM photos WHERE description LIKE '%beautiful%';
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT photo_url, description FROM photos WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = '987e6543-21b8-43d2-b654-426614172222' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT photo_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE photo_id = '456e1234-12b8-43c5-a321-426614171234' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT COUNT(photo_id) AS total_photos, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM photos JOIN comments ON photos.photo_id = comments.photo_id;
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT photo_id, photo_url FROM photos WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT video_url FROM videos WHERE video_id = 5;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT photo_id, user_id, upload_date FROM photos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT photo_id, photo_url, user_id FROM photos WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' AND upload_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_comments FROM comments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_comments DESC;
SELECT c.comment_text, p.photo_url, v.video_url FROM comments c INNER JOIN photos p ON c.photo_id = p.photo_id INNER JOIN videos v ON c.video_id = v.video_id;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_id IN (SELECT video_id FROM comments WHERE user_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM photos;
SELECT photo_id, photo_url, user_id, upload_date FROM photos WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT photo_id, photo_url FROM photos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_of_photos FROM photos GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, c.comment_text FROM users u INNER JOIN comments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT * FROM photos;
SELECT photo_id, photo_url, upload_date FROM photos WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM videos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM photos;
SELECT video_url FROM videos WHERE uploaded_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE bio IS NULL;
SELECT comment_id, content FROM comments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM likes ORDER BY liked_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT photo_url FROM photos ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id FROM likes WHERE liked_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registered_at >= '2022-01-01' AND bio IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
